task.title: Locking Objects
task.shortdesc: Locking object stops people from editing them. Only the uploader or administrator can unlock the object for public editing. If an object is unlocked, it will have an lock option on the menu bar.

taskbody.context: When modifying the metadata of an object (i.e. editing the MODS datastream) and when editing an XML document in CWRC Writer, the lock is automatically added by the system.

step.cmd: Hover over the Manage tab of the object you would like to lock and select Properties from the dropdown list.
Click on acquire the lock, located in the banner below the menu bar (see below).

taskbody.result: This takes you back to the object page with a banner that informs the user that they have set the lock and an option to remove the lock.
